---

*This publication list is automatically generated and updated weekly via GitHub Actions. Publication metadata is retrieved from [OpenAlex](https://openalex.org/), an open catalog of scholarly works. AI-generated summaries are created using Claude (claude-sonnet-4-20250514) to provide accessible overviews of each article. Citation counts are tracked over time and updated with each run. For questions about specific publications, please contact the author directly.*
